comments:
Build ID: CDT 4.0RC3

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Select a self-defined struct MyStruct_T
2. In the context menu (right click) select References->Workspace
3. An error message box will pop-up saying that an error occurred.
4. The search view is empty. But if you select in the search view "Show as List" you will get a list of all references ("Show as tree" still shows nothing if you choose it again). All references are correctly marked in the source files.
 
The log file shows the following:

This bug was related to bug #192352.
After switching to a totally new workspace everything works smoothly.
